extension.decker-server.description: Automatically starts a decker server upon opening a decker workspace and offers commands to start and stop the server as well as logging utilities.
extension.decker-server.config.autostart: Start the Decker Server automatically in the background when opening a decker workspace?
extension.decker-server.config.port: The default port that decker should be started on. Will move up in value if port is already in use.
extension.decker-server.config.command: The path or command to execute decker. If installed and on your PATH, 'decker' should suffice but if you want to use another executable change this value.
extension.decker-server.start.title: Start Decker Server
extension.decker-server.stop.title: Stop Decker Server
extension.decker-server.toggle.title: Toggle Decker Server
extension.decker-server.build.title: Build project
extension.decker-server.clean.title: Clean directory
extension.decker-server.crunch.title: Compress videos
extension.decker-server.publish.title: Publish to remote server
